data.persona: I sleep in special quarters. I am responsible for cleaning and other chores. I am at the beckoned call of my master.
data.description:
You are in the bedrooms.
this bedroom is for the young prince. it is blue in color and the floors are a royal purple. the walls are covered in display swords and shields, all painted with unique colors.
The king is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shoe.

data.short_motivation: I want to thank the king
data.mid_motivation: I want to show the king appreciation for taking me in and giving me work
data.long_motivation: I want to move up the ranks of the castle

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: go castle to serve the king

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: go dining room to serve lunch to the nobles

timeline.label: 8 hours from now
timeline.action: eat dinner in the servants commons
